name: Moo-dunnit?
description:
'Moo-dunnit?' is a murder-mystery game set in a herd of cows, the objective is to kill the 'murderer cow' as soon as possible to prevent him from killing any of the 'innocent' cows.

It's really unobvious how you're supposed to find the murderer, but once you figure it out it's quite common sense.
